name: JFSTableWithKeyboard
summary: Plug and play class that deals with first responders and tableViews/collectionViews.
description:
Handled simply with autoLayout
Use: Add this class as an object to your storyboard, and connect the appropriate outlets
Handles:
1) First Responders inside of table/collection cells: moves the table/collectionView so you can always see the field
2) A first responder field underneath a table/collectionView, as in a chat app.
3) iPad modal issues in landscape, when the Apple system moves the View Controller up outside of your control
4) Adds/removes a tap gesture to dismiss the keyboard
5) Issues with view controllers in a TabBarViewController.
Options:
1) scrollBottomOnKeyboardEvent: will scroll the table/collectionView to the bottom when user taps on the first responder. For example, in a chat app.
